name: Combine Harvester Simulator 2022
description:
Combine Harvester Simulator 2022 was made for the Godot Wild Jam #43 - Theme: Combine

Click and drag to charge up your harvester, and launch it at the wheat and/or powerups to beat the competition!

Powerups include:

  - Get an extra boost!

 - Expand your harvester's width!

- Shrink your havester - generally not a good idea! Best to avoid these.

 - Get a helping hand from a friendly farm hand!

 - Spawn a spray of mini harvesters!

  - Prevent enemies from launching next turn!

Controls:

Mouse to play and zoom in and out.

Press "R" to return to the menu.
